_header: There is a babe born of a may
_description: John Audelay, an Epiphany carol — eleven quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘Nowel nowel nowel’

BodDou302.First Lines: þer is ababe born of amayIn salucion of vs…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…þen þai begonon to syng & saySaluator mundy
                    domine
